statements: SELECT feature_id, feature_name, feature_description FROM transparency_features;
SELECT * FROM transparency_features WHERE feature_name = 'User Authentication';
SELECT feature_id, feature_name FROM transparency_features WHERE feature_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT feature_name, user_feedback FROM transparency_features WHERE feature_name LIKE '%Privacy%';
SELECT feature_id, implementation_details FROM transparency_features ORDER BY feature_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM transparency_features WHERE feature_name = 'Data encryption';
SELECT feature_name, feature_description FROM transparency_features WHERE feature_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT feature_id, feature_name, implementation_details FROM transparency_features ORDER BY feature_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM transparency_features WHERE user_feedback->>'rating' > '4' ORDER BY feature_id ASC;
SELECT feature_name, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM transparency_features GROUP BY feature_name HAVING total_count > 1;
SELECT * FROM transparency_features;
SELECT feature_name, description FROM transparency_features ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_trust WHERE is_trusted = true;
SELECT user_id, trust_level FROM user_trust ORDER BY trust_score DESC;
SELECT id, implementation_date FROM transparency_features WHERE implementation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM transparency_features WHERE id = 1;
SELECT feature_name, implementation_date FROM transparency_features WHERE feature_name = 'example_feature';
SELECT id, trust_level FROM user_trust WHERE trust_score > 3.5 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT MAX(trust_score) AS highest_trust_score FROM user_trust;
SELECT * FROM transparency_features WHERE description LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY implementation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM TransparencySettings
SELECT setting_name, is_enabled FROM TransparencySettings WHERE is_enabled = TRUE
SELECT * FROM TransparencyLogs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY username ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TransparencyLogs WHERE action = 'login'
SELECT * FROM TransparencyLogs WHERE action='login' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT setting_name, description FROM TransparencySettings WHERE is_enabled = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM TransparencyLogs tl INNER JOIN Users u ON tl.user_id = u.user_id WHERE u.username = 'john_doe';
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM TransparencyLogs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM ArUsers;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM ArUsers WHERE created_at > NOW();
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM ArProducts ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT user_id, product_id, rating FROM ArReviews WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, product_id, amount, transaction_date FROM ArTransactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM ArUsers;
SELECT user_id, email, created_at FROM ArUsers WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM ArProducts WHERE price > 100;
SELECT product_name, price, description FROM ArProducts ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT username, product_name, rating FROM ArUsers JOIN ArReviews ON ArUsers.user_id = ArReviews.user_id JOIN ArProducts ON ArReviews.product_id = ArProducts.product_id;
SELECT * FROM ar_users;
SELECT username, email FROM ar_users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, created_at FROM ar_users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT session_id, start_time, end_time FROM ar_sessions WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY start_time ASC;
SELECT transparency_id, transparency_level, comments FROM ar_transparency WHERE session_id = 5 ORDER BY transparency_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM ar_users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, email FROM ar_users WHERE username = 'Alice' AND created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT username, email, created_at FROM ar_users ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 3;

SELECT ar_transparency.transparency_id, ar_users.username, ar_sessions.start_time FROM ar_transparency JOIN ar_users ON ar_transparency.user_id = ar_users.user_id JOIN ar_sessions ON ar_transparency.session_id = ar_sessions.session_id WHERE ar_transparency.transparency_level > 3;
SELECT ar_users.username, ar_permissions.permission_type FROM ar_users LEFT JOIN ar_permissions ON ar_users.user_id = ar_permissions.user_id WHERE ar_permissions.expire_date IS NULL;
